Threat Response

Company: Applied Systems
Location: Bengaluru, Karnataka, India
LinkedIn post
Job Description

Job Title Threat Response Analyst

Job & Department Summary

Applied Systems, Inc., a worldwide leader in insurance technology, is currently searching for a

Threat Response Analyst to join our Corporate IT team. Enjoy working in a fast paced, high

energy, growing environment, working highly collaboratively and driving business results? Then

we are looking for you!

Required Skills & Experience

  • Educational Requirement: BE, BTech
  • 5-6 years of Experience
  • At least 3 years of experience conducting threat response activities.
  • Demonstrable knowledge of security event analysis leveraging SIEM tools.
  • Experience with endpoint detection and response solutions
  • Working knowledge of information security incident investigation and response skillset.
  • Working knowledge of security log parsing and analysis skill set.
  • Working knowledge of networking fundamentals (TCP/IP, DNS, SMTP/Email, network layers, Ethernet, ARP, etc.).
  • Utilize a logging platform (SIEM) for security analytics and identification of tactics, techniques, and patterns of attackers.
  • Contribute to the creation of threat and incident response runbooks.
  • Contribute to the production and tuning of event and threat detection rules.
  • Automate detection, analysis, and response action using SOAR and platform integrations
  • Participate in the Security Incident Response Team on-call rotation.
  • Collect and analyze threat intelligence reports covering new threats, vulnerabilities, products, and research.
  • Assist with the development of project plans and process documentation.
  • Author threat intelligence reports driven by our security operations team's own incidents, analysis, and adversary engagements.
  • Analyze event feeds and collected malware over the long term to trend and correlate.
  • Triages and handles/escalates security events and issues.

Location: Bengaluru
  • All the job profiles are publicly listed on recruitment platforms
